summary: These documents consist of memoranda and routing sheets regarding the investigation into E. Howard Hunt's activities, particularly his assignment to Madrid in the mid-1960s and financial transactions. The search for any undocumented payments to Hunt, especially around $30,000, is detailed, along with recollections from various Agency personnel about Hunt's role and activities. The documents also explore Hunt's post-Agency employment, his contacts with the Robert R. Mullen public relations firm, and requests he made for personnel with specific skills.
title: E. Howard Hunt Investigation Records
